title: Developing Flask Extensions
summary: You can create a web application with Flask in seven lines of code, and you can grow that app to thousands. How do you create reusable, shareable libraries? We'll use a simple but real extension I created (Flask-FeatureFlags) to look at the different ways you can make Flask awesome.
